titleStmt.title: Modèle TEI pour le projet de transcription collaborative des Testaments de Poilus
titleStmt.author: Florence Clavaud (Archives nationales | Centre Jean-Mabillon de l'Ecole nationale des chartes)

availability.p: TEI material can be licensed differently depending on the use you intend to make of it. Hence it is made available under both the CC+BY and BSD-2 licences. The CC+BY licence is generally appropriate for usages which treat TEI content as data or documentation. The BSD-2 licence is generally appropriate for usage of TEI content in a software environment. For further information or clarification, please contact the TEI Consortium (info@tei-c.org).

body.head: TEI Complete
body.p: Modèle documenté pour l'encodage en TEI de l'édition de testaments de Poilus, telle que pourra la produire la plate-forme de transcription collaborative en cours de développement (projet porté par l'U. de Cergy, les Archives nationales, l'Ecole des chartes, les AD des Yvelines, Patrima)
